snippet.description:

...as famous or destructive as riots later in detroit's history, the riot of 1863 was certainly a momentous occasion for the city of detroit and a historical event worthy...for weeks news of the riot and related issues filled the pages of the city's two main papers, the detroit free press and the detroit advertiser and tribune. the free...
